dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2273 IS: Wyoming Education Trust Modernization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Lummis (for herself and Mr. Barrasso) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Act of July 10, 1890, to modify certain provisions relating to the disposal of public land in the State of Wyoming for educational purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Wyoming Education Trust Modernization Act.

section.header: Disposal of public land in the State of Wyoming for educational purposes
section.text: The Act of July 10, 1890 (26 Stat. 222, chapter 664), is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in section 5, in the first sentence, by striking interest of and inserting earnings on;
in section 7, by striking interest of and inserting earnings on; and
in section 8, in the first sentence, by striking income thereof and inserting earnings on which.
